CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The absorption spectrum of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) in film is shown in Figure 2 together with that of P3HT and normalized AM 1.5G photon flux for comparison.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| P3HT |
| AM 1.5G |

In the paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are "PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)", "P3HT", and "AM 1.5G". These are materials mentioned in the context of their absorption spectra being compared.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| P3HT |

In the paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are "PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)" and "P3HT". These are the only materials mentioned in the context of their absorption spectra being compared. The "AM 1.5G" is not a material name, but a reference spectrum for solar irradiance, so it should not be included in the list of material names.
